document_data.caption: A map showing Grocer's Lane in the Adventurers' Quarter.
document_data.name: Grocer's Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Grocer's Lane''' was a small street located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
document_data.Location: Grocer's Lane was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]]. The street ran west to east through the Adventurers' Quarter, dividing it into a northern and southern half. [[Weeping Maiden's Run]] connected with the north side of Grocer's Lane near its midpoint, and [[Snake Alley]] connected from the south on its western end.
